templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.bostonscally.com/pages/order-lookup

templates.name: Shipping Time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via USPS. Once shipped, it takes 1-3 business days to reach your doorstep if you're on the East Coast and 3-5 business days for the rest of the country.

templates.name: How to size a Boston Scally Cap?
templates.content: You can check this article to get more information on how to size a Boston Scally Cap - https://bostonscally.attn.tv/sl/XfkujzUH

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: Our 100% guarantee promises all size exchanges are honored for up to 30 days of the purchase date, and they must be returned in unworn condition, with the original receipt. As far as refunds go, they must be processed within 14 days in order to receive the refund (minus shipping and processing fee). Orders received as a gift are only eligible for store credit/exchange.

templates.name: How do I start my return?
templates.content: Please start your return through here: https://bostonscally.loopreturns.com/#/

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but our shipping rates are flat fees based on how quickly you want it shipped.

templates.name: Where are your caps made / manufactured ?
templates.content: They're made in China but designed in US.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/bostonscally/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/BostonScallyCompany

templates.name: How much is your processing fee for returns?
templates.content: All returns for refunds have an $8.95 shipping and restocking fee. Original shipping charges are also non-refundable and the fee is only on refunds. We do offer store credit and exchanges without any fees.

templates.name: Where are you products shipped from?
templates.content: They are shipped from our fulfillment warehouse in PA.

templates.name: What is the bill on your caps?
templates.content: The bill on all of our caps is 2'' long.

templates.name: Military discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can use the code SCALLY12 for 12% off your purchase. Just make sure to add it at checkout and click "apply".

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@bostonscally.com. Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store, however we do pop-ups from time to time, so definitely keep an eye out!

templates.name: How do I clean / wash the caps?
templates.content: We recommend spot-cleaning your cap and tossing it in the dryer for 10 minutes at a time to freshen it up like new. We have found that Woollite also works great!

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size!  Do you have a tape measure? You can let me know the measurements of your head and I'll take a look. :)

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@bostonscally.com. Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at info@bostonscally.com.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at info@bostonscally.com or through this page: https://bostonscally.attn.tv/sl/7KdZChky Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Post Purchase Inquiries
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text and the fastest way to get help with your order is to email us at info@bostonscally.com. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help out!
